moves.1... Nf6: Deciding to withhold his central Pawns.
moves.4. e4: With the threat of P-K5 winning the pinned Knight.
moves.6. Nc4: The Black Q is in trouble.
moves.7. c3: Defending with a counterattack. if 7... Q-N4, 8 N-Q6 ch wins the Q [8... BxN 9 BxQ.]
moves.8. Bd2: The Q is trapped. Black resigns at once.

opening: Queen's pawn (A46), Torre attack, Wagner gambit
